The claim originated from a screenshot o: which alleged that Mike Pence had changed his Twitter banner photo to Biden and Harris.
The header photo on Pence: s Twitter account showed a man with white hair and a woman with brown hair holding hands and waving at a crowd, which was falsely interpreted as Biden and Harris.
Archived pages of Pence: s Twitter account revealed that he had actually changed his header photo to the image in question on November 3, prior to the events mentioned in the claim.
The fact: checking analysis concluded that the claim was false, as Pence did not change his header photo to one featuring Biden and Harris.
